content.text:
# Ministry of Education, Science, Sports and Culture

The  was a former Japanese government ministry. Its headquarters were in Kasumigaseki, Chiyoda, Tokyo.
The Ministry of Education was created in 1871. It merged with the |科学技術庁|Kagaku-gijutsu-chō}} into the new Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology (MEXT) on January 6, 2001.
